short_summary: Welding and painting services for Lobster Cove Head Light Tower.
full_summary:
# Lobster Cove Head Light Tower
## Request for Proposal (RFP) # 30004676-B
### Contract Award Information
#### Reference Number: CB-816-61160748
#### Amendment Number: 4
#### Solicitation Number: 30004676-B

#### Tender Closing Date | Date limite pour soumissioner :
* **Eng:** Friday, March 15, 2024, 2:00 PM ADT
* **Fra:** Vendredi 15 mars 2024, 14h00 HNE

#### Contact Information
Contact Name | Nom de contact
---------------|-----------------
Simon Cousineau | [simon.cousineau@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:simon.cousineau@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone          | (343) 548-1568

## Description of Tender
### English
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is a part of the contract for procurement services for the Lobster Cove Head Light Tower. The requirement is for welding and painting services for the maintnence of the tower. The vendor will perform tasks necessary for welding of cracks in the cast iron tower and painting the lower portion of the tower.

### French
Cette Demande de propositions (DP) fait partie du contrat de services de procurations pour l'entretien de la tour de phare de Lobster Cove Head. Le présent besoin concerne des services de soudure et de peinture de maintnenance de la tour. L'entrepreneur réalisera les travaux nécessaires pour la soudure des fissures de la tour cylindrique en fonte et pour la peinture de la portion inférieure de la tour.

## Contract Details
* Expected Contract Start Date | Date de début prévue du contrat: Monday, April 11, 2024
* The contract must be completed by Friday, August 31, 2024
* Regions of Opportunity | Régions du monde concernées: Canada
* Regions of Delivery | Régions de livraison: Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador (Newfoundland and Labrador)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applicable

# Acknowledgements
Please note that after the submission deadline, all bids will be considered non-binding and Canada has the right to alter or reject any or all bids. For more information, please refer to the contract information and attachment links below.
